item.title: Disable Translation Packages in Ubuntu
item.description: To disable downloading translations, create a file named /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/99translations & put the following in it: Acquire::Languages "none"; You may also need to remove existing translation files in /var/lib/apt/lists/ I personally just empty the lists folder and do an apt-get update
